scripts.test:debug: cross-env NODE_ENV=test node --inspect-brk -r tsconfig-paths/register -r ts-node/register node_modules/.bin/jest --runInBand
scripts.d:reset:dev: docker compose --env-file .env.development down -v && docker compose --env-file .env.development up -d --build
scripts.d:reset:prod: docker compose --env-file .env.production down -v && docker compose --env-file .env.production up -d --build
scripts.d:reset:staging: docker compose --env-file .env.staging down -v && docker compose --env-file .env.staging up -d --build
scripts.d:reset:test: docker compose --env-file .env.test down -v && docker compose --env-file .env.test up -d --build
scripts.migration:generate:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.migration:run:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.migration:show:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:show
scripts.migration:generate:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.migration:run:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.migration:show:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:show
scripts.migration:generate:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.migration:run:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.migration:show:staging: cross-env NODE_ENV=staging npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:show
scripts.migration:generate:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:generate
scripts.migration:run:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:run
scripts.migration:revert:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:revert
scripts.migration:show:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run typeorm -- -d ./data-source.ts migration:show
